description.zh-cn: 1919年至1945年大日本帝国驻扎在中国东北地区的部队。曾策划皇姑屯事件、九一八事变，扶植满洲国，最终在苏联发动的“八月风暴”攻势下投降。
description.en: A general army of the Imperial Japanese Army from 1919 to 1945, stationed in the northeastern region of China. It planned the Huanggutun Incident and the Mukden Incident, established the puppet state of Manchukuo, and ultimately surrendered following the Soviet 'August Storm' offensive.

description.zh-cn: 指1868年至1947年间的日本，关东军是其部署在中国东北的部队。
description.en: Refers to Japan from 1868 to 1947. The Kwantung Army was its force deployed in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国的陆上武装力量。
description.en: The ground-based armed force of the Empire of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 日本设于关东州的军政机构，其陆军部于1919年独立为关东军。
description.en: A military and administrative body established by Japan in the Kwantung Leased Territory. Its army department became the independent Kwantung Army in 1919.

description.zh-cn: 1928年由关东军策划的、针对中国奉系军阀首领张作霖的暗杀事件。
description.en: An assassination plot targeting Zhang Zuolin, leader of the Chinese Fengtian clique, planned by the Kwantung Army in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 中国东北奉系军阀首领，在皇姑屯事件中被关东军炸死。
description.en: Leader of the Fengtian clique in Northeast China, assassinated by the Kwantung Army in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖之子，东北军将领。在其父死后顺利继承其位。
description.en: Son of Zhang Zuolin and a general of the Northeastern Army. He succeeded his father after his death.

description.zh-cn: 由关东军在中国东北蓄意制造并发动的一场侵华事件，被视为十四年抗战的开始。
description.en: An invasion incident deliberately created and launched by the Kwantung Army in Northeast China, considered the beginning of the Fourteen-Year War of Resistance Against Japan.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30至40年代中国抵抗日本侵略的战争。九一八事变被视为其开端。
description.en: The war of resistance fought by China against Japanese aggression in the 1930s and 1940s. The Mukden Incident is regarded as its beginning.

description.zh-cn: 1932年由大日本帝国关东军扶植的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established by the Kwantung Army of the Empire of Japan in 1932.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇帝爱新觉罗·溥仪，后被关东军扶植为满洲国皇帝。
description.en: Aisin-Gioro Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing dynasty, later installed by the Kwantung Army as the emperor of Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 日本关东军与苏联红军在满蒙边界诺门罕地区发生的大规模军事冲突，关东军在此战中惨败。
description.en: A large-scale military conflict between the Japanese Kwantung Army and the Soviet Red Army in the Nomonhan region on the Manchu-Mongolian border, resulting in a decisive defeat for the Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

nodes.id: 格奥尔基·康斯坦丁诺维奇·朱可夫

zh-cn: 格奥尔基·康斯坦丁诺维奇·朱可夫

description.zh-cn: 苏联军事将领，在诺门罕战役中指挥苏联远东军击败了关东军。
description.en: A Soviet military general who commanded the Soviet Far East Army to defeat the Kwantung Army in the Battles of Nomonhan.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军大将，因诺门罕战役的失败被撤去关东军司令官职务。
description.en: A general in the Imperial Japanese Army who was dismissed as commander of the Kwantung Army following the defeat in the Battles of Nomonhan.

description.zh-cn: 苏联在第二次世界大战末期对日本控制的满洲国发动的军事行动，直接导致了关东军的投降。
description.en: A military operation launched by the Soviet Union against the Japanese-controlled state of Manchukuo at the end of World War II, directly leading to the surrender of the Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟。1945年8月对日宣战并进攻关东军。
description.en: Union of Soviet Socialist Republics. Declared war on Japan in August 1945 and attacked the Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 日本与苏联在1941年签订的中立条约，苏联于1945年进攻满洲前废除了该条约。
description.en: A neutrality pact signed between Japan and the Soviet Union in 1941, which the Soviet Union renounced before its invasion of Manchuria in 1945.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军大将，关东军最后一任总司令，于1945年8月19日向苏军投降。
description.en: A general in the Imperial Japanese Army and the last commander of the Kwantung Army, who surrendered to the Soviet forces on August 19, 1945.

description.zh-cn: 1946年2月，由原关东军125师团残部联合国民党发起的武装暴动，被东北民主联军镇压。
description.en: An armed rebellion launched in February 1946 by remnants of the former Kwantung Army's 125th Division in alliance with the Kuomintang, which was suppressed by the Northeast Democratic United Army.

description.zh-cn: 原日本关东军的一个师团，其残部于1946年2月发动了通化事件。
description.en: A former division of the Japanese Kwantung Army, remnants of which launched the Tonghua Incident in February 1946.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在东北地区组建的武装力量，曾镇压通化事件。
description.en: An armed force established by the Communist Party of China in Northeast China, which suppressed the Tonghua Incident.

description.zh-cn: 关东军是大日本帝国陆军的一个总军。
description.en: The Kwantung Army was a general army of the Imperial Japanese Army.

description.zh-cn: 1919年，在关东都督府陆军部的基础上设立了关东军司令部，原关东都督府陆军部独立成为关东军。
description.en: In 1919, the Kwantung Army Command was established based on the Army Department of the Kwantung Governor-General's Office, and the original Army Department became the independent Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 关东军策划并制造了旨在刺杀张作霖的皇姑屯事件。
description.en: The Kwantung Army planned and executed the Huanggutun Incident to assassinate Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖在皇姑屯事件中被关东军设置的炸弹刺杀身亡。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin was assassinated and killed by a bomb planted by the Kwantung Army in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 张学良是张作霖的儿子。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang is the son of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 关东军通过制造柳条湖事件，发动了九一八事变。
description.en: The Kwantung Army initiated the Mukden Incident by staging the Liutiaohu Incident.

description.zh-cn: 九一八事变被视为十四年抗战的开始。
description.en: The Mukden Incident is considered the beginning of the Fourteen-Year War of Resistance.

description.zh-cn: 关东军扶植前清宣统帝，建立了满洲国。
description.en: The Kwantung Army supported the former Qing emperor Puyi to establish Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 宣统帝溥仪被关东军扶植为满洲国皇帝。
description.en: The Xuantong Emperor Puyi was installed by the Kwantung Army as the emperor of Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 关东军在诺门罕战役中被朱可夫指挥的苏联红军击败，导致其“北进”计划严重受挫。
description.en: The Kwantung Army was defeated by the Soviet Red Army under the command of Georgy Zhukov in the Battles of Nomonhan, severely thwarting its 'Northward Advance' plan.

relationships.source: 格奥尔基·康斯坦丁诺维奇·朱可夫

description.zh-cn: 在诺门罕战役中，朱可夫指挥苏联远东军击败了关东军。
description.en: In the Battles of Nomonhan, Zhukov commanded the Soviet Far East Army and defeated the Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 诺门罕战役失败后，时任关东军司令官植田谦吉被撤职。
description.en: After the defeat in the Battles of Nomonhan, the then-commander of the Kwantung Army, Ueda Kenkichi, was dismissed.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月，苏联违反日苏中立条约，对日本宣战。
description.en: In August 1945, the Soviet Union violated the Soviet–Japanese Neutrality Pact and declared war on Japan.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月，苏联发动了针对关东军的“八月风暴”军事行动。
description.en: In August 1945, the Soviet Union launched the 'August Storm' military operation against the Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 在苏联发动的“八月风暴”攻势下，关东军被击败并最终投降。
description.en: Under the 'August Storm' offensive launched by the Soviet Union, the Kwantung Army was defeated and ultimately surrendered.

description.zh-cn: 关东军最后一任总司令山田乙三向苏联红军代表交出军刀，宣布投降。
description.en: The last commander of the Kwantung Army, Otozō Yamada, surrendered his sword to a representative of the Soviet Red Army, announcing his capitulation.

description.zh-cn: 原关东军125师团残部联合国民党通化党部发起了通化事件。
description.en: Remnants of the former Kwantung Army's 125th Division, in conjunction with the Kuomintang's Tonghua party headquarters, launched the Tonghua Incident.

description.zh-cn: 东北民主联军击败并发起了通化事件的暴动者，镇压了该事件。
description.en: The Northeast Democratic United Army defeated the rebels who initiated the Tonghua Incident and suppressed the event.
